Package org.forgerock.openig.heap

Manages collections or "heaps" of associated objects, initialized from declarative configuration artfiacts.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Heap Manages a collection of associated objects created and initialized by Heaplet objects.
Heaplet Creates and initializes an object that is stored in a Heap.
 

Class Summary
GenericHeaplet A generic base class for heaplets with automatically injected fields.
GenericHeapObject A generic base class for heap objects with handy injected heap objects.
HeapImpl The concrete implementation of a heap.
Heaplets Loads Heaplet classes based on the class of object they create.
HeapUtil Utility methods for managing objects in the heap.
NestedHeaplet A generic base class for a heaplet nested within the class it creates.
 

Exception Summary
HeapException An exception that is thrown during heap operations.
 

Package org.forgerock.openig.heap Description

Manages collections or "heaps" of associated objects, initialized from declarative configuration artfiacts.
